examples.translation: 他的话只不过是无聊的吓唬人罢了，他是伤害不了我们的。
让所有这些机器闲置着，我们可负担不起损失。
examples.first: We can't afford to have all this expensive machinery lying

n: the state of an engine or other mechanism that is idling
adj: not in action or at work
without a basis in reason or fact
v: be idle; exist in a changeless situation

vi: 不作事, 闲逛; (机器)空转
adj: 无目的的, 无聊的; 懒惰的, 闲散的; 无根据的
